refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This file contains types mapping to the XMLRPC standard fundamental types, structures, arrays and faults. It contains a generic parser that has no I/O dependencies.

refsect2.title: GskXmlrpcArray
refsect2.para: An array of XMLRPC values. Each may have a different type.

listitem.simpara: the values in the array.

refsect2.title: GskXmlrpcStruct
refsect2.para: A structure, which is a set of named members.

refsect2.title: GskXmlrpcValue
refsect2.para: A XMLRPC value that may be of any of the XMLRPC types. The type is included with the value.

refsect2.title: GskXmlrpcNamedValue
refsect2.para: A name/value pair, appropriate as a structure member.

listitem.simpara: the string, name, label.
the typed value.

refsect2.title: GskXmlrpcRequest
refsect2.para: An XMLRPC request (invocation).

refsect2.title: GskXmlrpcResponse
refsect2.para: An XMLRPC response (return).

refsect2.title: GskXmlrpcParser
refsect2.para: An object which can parse XMLRPC requests and responses, in any order. It does no interpretation of the requests or responses.

refsect2.title: enum GskXmlrpcType
refsect2.programlisting: typedef enum { EVA_XMLRPC_INT32, EVA_XMLRPC_BOOLEAN, EVA_XMLRPC_DOUBLE, EVA_XMLRPC_STRING, EVA_XMLRPC_DATE, EVA_XMLRPC_BINARY_DATA, EVA_XMLRPC_STRUCT, EVA_XMLRPC_ARRAY } GskXmlrpcType;
refsect2.para: The type of a XMLRPC value.

listitem.simpara: a 32-bit integer.
a boolean value, written as 0 or 1.
a double-precission floating-point value.
a string value, NUL-terminated.
a date and time.
binary data, which will be transmitted as base64, but is always presented to the user as raw bytes.
a set of named values.
an array of values.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_new ()
refsect2.para: Allocate a new structure, with no members.

listitem.simpara: the newly allocated structure.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_free ()
refsect2.para: Free memory associated with an XMLRPC struct.

listitem.simpara: the structure to free.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_add_int32 ()
refsect2.para: Add a single int32 member to the given struct.

listitem.simpara: the structure to append to.
name of the new int32 member.
value of the new int32 member.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_add_boolean ()
refsect2.para: Add a single boolean member to the given struct.

listitem.simpara: the structure to append to.
name of the new boolean member.
value of the new boolean member.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_add_double ()
refsect2.para: Add a single double member to the given struct.

listitem.simpara: the structure to append to.
name of the new double member.
value of the new double member.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_add_string ()
refsect2.para: Add a single string member to the given struct.

listitem.simpara: the structure to append to.
name of the new string member.
value of the new string member.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_add_date ()
refsect2.para: Add a single date member to the given struct.

listitem.simpara: the structure to append to.
name of the new date member.
value of the new date member.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_add_data ()
refsect2.para: Add a single data member to the given struct.

listitem.simpara: the structure to append to.
name of the new date member.
binary data to add, which will be freed by the structure when it is freed.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_add_struct ()
refsect2.para: Add a structure as a member of another structure.

listitem.simpara: the structure to append to.
name of the new struct member.
substructure to add, which will be freed by structure when it is freed.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_add_array ()
refsect2.para: Add an array as a member of a structure.

listitem.simpara: the structure to append to.
name of the new struct member.
subarray to add, which will be freed by structure when it is freed.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_peek_date ()
refsect2.para: Lookup a named date member of a structure, storing the result, if any, in out.

listitem.simpara: the structure to lookup the member of.
the value to retrieve.
place to store the result.
whether there was an date member named member_name.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_peek_boolean ()
refsect2.para: Lookup a named boolean member of a structure, storing the result, if any, in out.

listitem.simpara: the structure to lookup the member of.
the value to retrieve.
place to store the result.
whether there was an boolean member named member_name.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_peek_double ()
refsect2.para: Lookup a named double member of a structure, storing the result, if any, in out.

listitem.simpara: the structure to lookup the member of.
the value to retrieve.
place to store the result.
whether there was an double member named member_name.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_peek_struct ()
refsect2.para: Lookup a named substructure member of a structure, returning a reference to the GskXmlrpcStruct result, or NULL.

listitem.simpara: the structure to lookup the member of.
the value to retrieve.
a reference (not a copy!) to the struct, or NULL.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_peek_data ()
refsect2.para: Lookup a named binary-data member of a structure, returning a reference to the GByteArray result, or NULL.

listitem.simpara: the structure to lookup the member of.
the value to retrieve.
a reference (not a copy!) to the binary data, or NULL.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_peek_array ()
refsect2.para: Lookup a named subarray member of a structure, returning a reference to the GskXmlrpcArray result, or NULL.

listitem.simpara: the structure to lookup the member of.
the value to retrieve.
a reference (not a copy!) to the array, or NULL.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_peek_string ()
refsect2.para: Lookup a named string member of a structure, returning the result, or NULL.

listitem.simpara: the structure to lookup the member of.
the value to retrieve.
the string value, or NULL.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_struct_peek_int32 ()
refsect2.para: Lookup a named int32 member of a structure, storing the result, if any, in out.

listitem.simpara: the structure to lookup the member of.
the value to retrieve.
place to store the result.
whether there was an int32 member named member_name.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_array_new ()
refsect2.para: Allocate a new, empty array.*

listitem.simpara: the newly allocated arrays.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_array_free ()
refsect2.para: Free the array and all its values.

listitem.simpara: the array to free.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_array_add_int32 ()
refsect2.para: Append an integer to an XMLRPC array.

listitem.simpara: array to which to append a value.
integer value to append.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_array_add_boolean ()
refsect2.para: Append a boolean to an XMLRPC array.

listitem.simpara: array to which to append a value.
boolean value to append.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_array_add_double ()
refsect2.para: Append a double-precision floating-pointer value to an XMLRPC array.

listitem.simpara: array to which to append a value.
double value to append.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_array_add_string ()
refsect2.para: Append a string to an XMLRPC array.

listitem.simpara: array to which to append a value.
string value to append. This value is copied: we do not take ownership.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_array_add_date ()
refsect2.para: Append a string to an XMLRPC array.

listitem.simpara: array to which to append a value.
date/time value to append.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_array_add_data ()
refsect2.para: Append a binary-data element to an XMLRPC array. This take ownership of data.

listitem.simpara: array to which to append a value.
a byte array containing arbitrary binary-data. The XMLRPC array takes ownership of the data.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_array_add_struct ()
refsect2.para: Append a binary-data element to an XMLRPC array. This take ownership of substructure.

listitem.simpara: array to which to append a value.
structure to append to array. It will be freed by the array.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_array_add_array ()
refsect2.para: Append a binary-data element to an XMLRPC array. This take ownership of subarray.

listitem.simpara: array to which to append a value.
array to append to array. It will be freed by the array.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_request_new ()
refsect2.para: Allocate a new request. At a very minimum, it should have a method name set with eva_xmlrpc_request_set_name().

listitem.simpara: a newly allocated request.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_request_ref ()
refsect2.para: Increase the reference count on request.

listitem.simpara: the request to reference.
the request, for convenience.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_request_unref ()
refsect2.para: Decrease the reference count on request, and free it if the count reached 0.

listitem.simpara: the request to stop referencing.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_request_set_name ()
refsect2.para: Set the method name for this request.

listitem.simpara: the request whose method-name should be set.
the name of the method to invoke.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_request_add_int32 ()
refsect2.para: Append an integer to an XMLRPC request.

listitem.simpara: request to whose parameters a value shall be appended.
integer value to append.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_request_add_boolean ()
refsect2.para: Append a boolean to an XMLRPC request.

listitem.simpara: request to whose parameters a value shall be appended.
integer value to append.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_request_add_double ()
refsect2.para: Append a double to an XMLRPC request.

listitem.simpara: request to whose parameters a value shall be appended.
double value to append.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_request_add_string ()
refsect2.para: Append a string to an XMLRPC request.

listitem.simpara: request to whose parameters a value shall be appended.
string value to append.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_request_add_date ()
refsect2.para: Append a date to an XMLRPC request.

listitem.simpara: request to whose parameters a value shall be appended.
date value to append.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_request_add_data ()
refsect2.para: Append binary data to an XMLRPC request (it will be base64 encoded transparently).

listitem.simpara: request to whose parameters a value shall be appended.
GByteArray to append: it shall be freed by the request, that is, there is a transfer of ownership.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_request_add_struct ()
refsect2.para: Add a structure as a parameter to the request.

listitem.simpara: request to whose parameters a value shall be appended.
structure to append to array. This will be freed by the request automatically: a transfer of ownership occurs in this function.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_request_add_array ()
refsect2.para: Add a structure as a parameter to the request.

listitem.simpara: request to whose parameters a value shall be appended.
array to append to request's parmeter list. This will be freed by the request automatically: a transfer of ownership occurs in this function.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_response_new ()
refsect2.para: Allocate a new response.

listitem.simpara: the newly allocated response which has no parameters and no fault.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_response_ref ()
refsect2.para: Increase the reference count on response.

listitem.simpara: the response to reference.
the response, for convenience.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_response_unref ()
refsect2.para: Decrease the reference count on response, and free it if the count reached 0.

listitem.simpara: the response to stop referencing.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_response_add_int32 ()
refsect2.para: Append an integer to an XMLRPC response.

listitem.simpara: response to whose parameters a value shall be appended.
integer value to append.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_response_add_boolean ()
refsect2.para: Append a boolean to an XMLRPC response.

listitem.simpara: response to whose parameters a value shall be appended.
integer value to append.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_response_add_double ()
refsect2.para: Append a double to an XMLRPC response.

listitem.simpara: response to whose parameters a value shall be appended.
double value to append.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_response_add_string ()
refsect2.para: Append a string to an XMLRPC response.

listitem.simpara: response to whose parameters a value shall be appended.
string value to append.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_response_add_date ()
refsect2.para: Append a date to an XMLRPC response.

listitem.simpara: response to whose parameters a value shall be appended.
date value to append.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_response_add_data ()
refsect2.para: Append binary data to an XMLRPC response (it will be base64 encoded transparently).

listitem.simpara: response to whose parameters a value shall be appended.
GByteArray to append: it shall be freed by the response, that is, there is a transfer of ownership.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_response_add_struct ()
refsect2.para: Add a structure as a parameter to the response.

listitem.simpara: response to whose parameters a value shall be appended.
structure to append to array. This will be freed by the response automatically: a transfer of ownership occurs in this function.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_response_add_array ()
refsect2.para: Add a structure as a parameter to the response.

listitem.simpara: response to whose parameters a value shall be appended.
array to append to response's parmeter list. This will be freed by the response automatically: a transfer of ownership occurs in this function.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_response_fault ()
refsect2.para: Indicate that an error occurred trying to process the XMLRPC request.

listitem.simpara: the response to affect.
the fault information. This should be a struct with at most an integer 'faultCode' and a string 'faultString'.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_parser_new ()
refsect2.para: Allocate a new XMLRPC parser. A parser can parse both requests and responses.

listitem.simpara: the newly allocated parser.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_parser_feed ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean eva_xmlrpc_parser_feed (GskXmlrpcParser *parser, const char *text, gssize len, GError **error);
refsect2.para: Pass data into the XMLRPC parser.
If this works, eva_xmlrpc_parser_get_request() and/or eva_xmlrpc_parser_get_response() should be called as appropriate until there are no more messages to dequeue.

listitem.simpara: the parser to give data.
the data to parse (it may just be a partial request).
the length of text, or -1 to use NUL-termination.
place to put the error object if the parsing has a problem.
TRUE if processing did not encounter an error.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_parser_get_request ()
refsect2.para: Get a parsed request from the list maintained by the parser.

listitem.simpara: parser to try and get a parsed request from.
a reference to the request; the caller must call eva_xmlrpc_request_unref() eventually.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_parser_get_response ()
refsect2.para: Get a parsed response from the list maintained by the parser.

listitem.simpara: parser to try and get a parsed response from.
a reference to the response; the caller must call eva_xmlrpc_response_unref() eventually.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_parser_free ()
refsect2.para: Free the memory associated with the parser.

listitem.simpara: the parser to free.

refsect2.title: eva_xmlrpc_response_to_buffer ()
refsect2.para: Write the XML corresponding to this response to the buffer.

listitem.simpara: the XMLRPC response to serialize.
the buffer to append to.
